topic.title: Flush a Bucket
topic.shortdesc: Full, Cluster, and Bucket Administrators can use the Flush button to start bucket flushing and delete every object in a bucket.

body.p: Flushing will work only if this option was configured either during the initial bucket setup or after the bucket settings have been changed.
The Flush button provides an additional security measure to prevent unintentional loss of data.
You can also use the commands the CLI command bucket-flush and REST API rest-bucket-flush.
